proverbs: O le ala i le pule o le tautua. (The path to leadership is through service.)
E le sili le ta'i i lo le tapua'i. (Faithfulness is greater than ability.)
E lele le toloa ae ma’au i le vai. (The duck may fly, but it will always return to water.)
encouragements: Ia e loto toa – be strong and courageous!
E alofa le Atua ia te oe. (God loves you.)
Toe sa'ilia pea lou fa'amoemoe. (Keep searching for your purpose.)
